fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once per game, set someone's post number to a specific amount.
- Increase or decrease someone's post number by any amount.
- 3 times per game, change someone's status, either killing or reviving them. You may only kill 2 people, and only revive 2 people, not the same thing 3 times.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When changing a post number, if it would result in a negative, or a number higher than the current highest consecutive post number, it will overflow to ensure a valid role exists. However, if the end result would be a valid role in <#970046125065265202> (negative roles included), overflow won't be used. Yes, you can turn someone into an Android or Mainframe. Why? I dunno, you just can.
- You may multitask.
